decision_conditions:
S73 - CONSENT LIMITED TO THAT OF ORIGINAL PERMISSION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 26/10/2025

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 26/10/2022 [LBI ref: P2022/2883/FUL. Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
description:
Variation of Condition (2) of Planning Permission Ref. P2022/2883/FUL dated 26/10/2022 for 'Extension and refurbishment including rear extensions to provide external terraces at first, second, third and fourth floor levels; erection of a mansard roof extension at fourth floor; rooflights and plant enclosures; removal of the access between 17 & 18 Clerkenwell Close, window refurbishment, front entrance enhancement and external basement level enhancements; associated internal alterations, including erection of a new bike store, showers, lockers, refuse store, accessible WC and evacuation lift'. The following amendments are sought: 
-	New stair pressurisation ductwork, fan unit and riser at roof level, for improved fire safety on all floors, 
-	New life safety Uninterrupted Power Supply (UPS) batteries located in the basement with required cooling units at roof level,  
-	Increased Cold Water Storage Tank and Booster room size at basement level and
-	Reorganisation of internal risers, including ATS system serving the evacuation lift and the stair pressurisation system.
